mapper.insert: INSERT INTO money_log(user_seq, money_type, money, total_money, type, adopt_seq) VALUE(#{userSeq}, #{moneyType.typeStr}, #{money}, #{totalMoney}, #{purposeEnum.purposeStr}, #{adoptSeq});
INSERT INTO money_log(user_seq, money_type, money, total_money, type, charge_log_seq) VALUE(#{userSeq}, #{moneyType.typeStr}, #{money}, #{totalMoney}, #{purposeEnum.purposeStr}, #{chargeLogSeq});
